metadata.title: CVE-2024-45491 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. dtdCopy in xmlparse.c canhave an integer overflow for nDefaultAtts on 32-bit platforms (whereUINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

criterions.comment: expat package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
